forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers with a possible thunderstorm this morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm during the morning, then some lingering showers still possible this afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with increasing winds overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy and windy with periods of rain that will taper off in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy and windy at times with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High 54F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
